statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_data;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_text FROM patient_data ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_text FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND diagnosis_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis_text FROM patient_data WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_name FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_results WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_result FROM diagnostic_results WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_data WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50 AND diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, date_recorded FROM patient_data JOIN diagnostic_results ON patient_data.patient_id = diagnostic_results.patient_id WHERE patient_age < 30 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT diagnostic_test, result, confidence_level FROM diagnostic_results WHERE result = 'Positive' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT record_id, diagnostic_test, result, confidence_level FROM diagnostic_results WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC, diagnosis DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT history_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_history ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_type IN ('Blood Test', 'X-Ray') ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, history_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id ORDER BY history_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, patient_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, test_type, test_result FROM test_results JOIN patients ON test_results.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors ORDER BY hospital ASC;
